Buddha.dll is a Trojan

I have steam installed, i installed the game, put the crack into the folder where it says binaries, and when i go to start the game it says damaged saved game, unavailable to load saved game. I have done everything i can think of to get it to work. What am i doing wrong that you didn't?. It goes to the menu but it won't let me click on anything.
it doesnt work norton keeps blocking it

hulkman185 If it says your save file is corrupt rename the file username/documents/mygames/transformers

It worked for me.  I think the War of Cybertron saved file is named the same as this game.
Rename the file username/documents/my games/transformers if it is not loading your save file.

I am also getting a "campaign saved game is damaged and unavailable" error on start up. 

I can't rename the file username/documents/my games/transformers because the folder is empty. 

There is a folder for "War for Cybertron" (it's called "TransGame") but I don't think the saves would be compatible.

OK 

Got a fix to work:

rename the folder username/documents/my games/transformers/TransGame/SaveData to something else (i used SaveData old) then make a new empty folder named SaveData in its place.

The game is getting confused when it tries to open the war for cybertron saved games. Just give it an empty folder and it will let you play.

Anyone else getting a 0xc0000142 error when trying to start the game on Windows 8 x64 Consumer Preview?
